page.title: The $itemName
page.text: This $itemName acts similarly to the [item name=decomposer] Machine. While the $itemName is in the player's hotbar and has assign items. It will decompose any picked up items matching the assigned ones.
To assign items just place the $itemName with the appropriate item containning matter in the [item mod=minecraft name=anvil]. Once an item is assigned it cannot be removed.

The $itemName is quite inefficient, compared to it's counterpart the [item name=decomposer]. Once an item is decomposed it's matter will be stored in the internal tank. To empty the $itemName just right click on a Tank that can hold [quide name=matter].
